

```{r}
library(fauxnaif)
census_data <- fauxnaif::faux_census
```

```{r}
na_if(census_data$income, 9999999)
```

```{r}
census_data %>% dplyr::mutate(income = na_if(income, 9999999))
```

```{r}
census_data %>% na_if_at("income", 9999999)
```

```{r}
census_data %>% na_if_at("income", 9999999)
```

```{r}
census_data %>% na_if_at("age", 2, 557)

census_data %>% na_if_at("age", ~ . < 18, ~ . > 122)
census_data %>% na_if_not_at("age", 18:122)
```

```{r}
census_data %>% na_if_at("state", ~ nchar(.) > 2)
census_data %>% na_if_not_at("state", ~ nchar(.) == 2)
```

```{r}
census_data %>% dplyr::select(-state) %>% na_if_if(is.character, ~ nchar(.) > 25)
```
